item.description:
Here is the info on the St. Patty's dinner meetup:

St. Patty's Corned Beef & Cabbage dinner
To benefit the Palmer Knights of Columbus Scholarship Fund
St. Thomas Parish Center, 1076 Thorndike Street, Palmer, MA
$10 donation per person - pay at the door

Saturday March 14th, 6:00pm


The Palmer Council #376 of the Knights of Columbus is holding a Corned Beef & Cabbage dinner for the benefit of the Council Scholarship Fund. The food is purchased from Arnold's Meat Market, and is prepared by the council itself, and is the best around.
The Quaboag Highlanders Pipes & Drums will be there for some traditional bagpipe music, followed by a wonderful show of step dancing from students of the Claddagh School of Irish Dance.
There will be 3 raffles as well; a bag raffle consisting of over 50 prizes, a grand prize raffle, and a 50/50 cash raffle.
We're up against 4 other events in town this year and don't expect to sell out; tickets will be available at the door.

RSVP this MEETUP but please, only if you really plan to go. Seating for MEETUP participants will be reserved but I appreciate an accurate count.

This is the same meetup as posted on the "East of the River Dining Out Group, fun, new friendships" group.
If People want to car pool it would be great. we can meet in a commuter lot. Gary travels to meet us Lets support him this time.
----------------------------------------------------------------
item.how_to_find_us: Reserved tables will be set aside

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: St. Patty's Corned Beef & Cabbage Dinner
